email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I hope you're doing well. I have a vessel available for a crude oil shipment from Houston to Rotterdam. The vessel is the MV Ocean Star, 150,000 DWT, 280m LOA. The laycan is 15-20 October. I can offer a freight rate in the low 50s, say $50.75 per metric ton. Let me know if this works for you. Best regards, Sarah.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the quick response. The laycan works for us, but the freight rate is a bit high. Can you come down to $49.50 per metric ton? Also, could you confirm the demurrage rate? Best, John.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, thanks for your reply. I can do $49.75 per metric ton, which is the best I can offer at the moment. The demurrage rate is $20,000 per day, pro rata. Let me know if this is acceptable. Best, Sarah.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, $49.75 works for us. Please confirm the laycan is still 15-20 October and that the vessel is ready to load. Also, can you send over the full vessel details and the charter party agreement? Best, John.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, great to hear. Yes, the laycan is confirmed for 15-20 October, and the vessel is ready to load. I’ll send over the full vessel details and the charter party agreement shortly. The freight rate is $49.75 per metric ton, and demurrage is $20,000 per day, pro rata. Let me know if you need anything else. Best, Sarah.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, everything looks good. Please proceed with the booking. I’ll review the charter party agreement once you send it over. Thanks for your help. Best, John.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, the booking is confirmed. I’ve attached the charter party agreement for your review. Let me know if there are any issues. Looking forward to working with you on this shipment. Best regards, Sarah.
